entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't run SDK tests in VS #32300
  • Enable documentation files in GenAPI and API Compat codebase #32296
  • PublishSelfContained should not do a self-contained build #32277

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2174829 #32308
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Remove template runtimeconfig #32302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] added `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Utils.dll` to package content #32301
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix GenAPI when reading assemblies from metadata #32276
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #32193
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32126
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust test expected result following the change to .gitignore #32283
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
